General.Name: Green River Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Green River Holding Co. Ltd. manufactures and sells particle boards, solid wood products, and resins. The company also offers parawood, rubber solid wood panels, and rubber wood raw materials, as well as engages in investment business. It sells its products in Thailand, Malaysia, China, Indonesia, Korea, Vietnam, and internationally. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Songkhla, Thailand.
